title: Fernando ton powers Sri Lanka to 300-9 in S. Africa ODI

title: Vaccination of those above 18 begins at distinct level

title: Chemonics International and EPRI Collaborate to Drive Clean Energy Innovation Around the World

title: Politicizing origins of COVID-19 cannot cover up U.S. failure at home: Chinese envoy
snippet: The United States' insistance on politicizing the origins of COVID-19 by blaming China for the outbreak is an attempt to distract from its failure in handling the pandemic at home, Chinese Ambassador to Sri Lanka Qi Zhenhong wrote in an article published by local media outlets on Thursday.

title: COVID-19: Sri Lankans manufacture cardboard coffins
